articles.author: Lili Bayer, Tom Balmforth, Olena Harmash
articles.description: Europe and Ukraine's leaders will speak to U.S. President Donald Trump at a virtual meeting on Wednesday ahead of his summit with Russia's Vladimir Putin, as they try to drive home the perils of selling out Kyiv's interests in pursuit of a ceasefire.
articles.title: Zelenskiy, European leaders to speak to Trump ahead of Putin summit
